name: voice-qa-app
description: Voice-Driven Q&A Application with React and FastAPI

scripts.dev: npm run setup && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:backend: node -e "process.platform === 'win32' ? require('child_process').execSync('cd backend && venv\\Scripts\\activate && uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000', {stdio: 'inherit', shell: true}) : require('child_process').execSync('cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000', {stdio: 'inherit', shell: true})"
scripts.install:all: cd backend && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.test: cd backend && pytest && cd ../frontend && npm test
scripts.lint: cd backend && black . && isort . && cd ../frontend && npm run lint

author: Voice Q&A Team
